meanings.definition: A large carnivorous dinosaur of the family Tyrannosauridae.
meanings.sent1: The tyrannosaurid roared loudly in the prehistoric jungle.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bones of the tyrannosaurid to learn more about its behavior.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they imagined a tiny tyrannosaurid trying to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her boss was a tyrannosaurid in the office, always demanding perfection.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit brought the tyrannosaurid to life with its realistic movements.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of tyrannosaurids.
meanings.sent1: The tyrannosaurid features in the movie were incredibly lifelike.
meanings.sent2: The researcher presented new findings on the tyrannosaurid species.
meanings.sent3: The tyrannosaurid-themed party decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was described as tyrannosaurid, always taking charge.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the tyrannosaurid world in his painting.
